article.title: Circumstellar interaction in supernovae in dense environments - an observational perspective

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of emission is produced by the hot forward and reverse shocks created by the interaction of SN ejecta with the surrounding CSM?
What does the temperature of the forward CSM shock (TCS) primarily depend on, assuming cosmic abundances?
What is the primary factor affecting the column density of the cool dense shell (CDS) formed in the shocked region of a SN IIn?
What assumption about the wind is made in the formula for calculating the mass loss rate (MË™) from the free-free absorption optical depth?
